summary: Increases the power of the Archmage's Robes (both hooded and unhooded) and the Dark Brotherhood Robe.
descriptionHtml:
SE Note: I'll probably do something like this again once the new CK is released.

Simple mod, it increases the power of the DB robe to be more in line with basic Mage robes. It also increases the potency of the Archmage's Robe.

===========
Buffed Stats
===========

Archmage's Robe: All spells cost <20>% less to cast, and magicka regenerates <150>% faster.

Hooded Archmage's Robe: All spells cost <20>% less to cast, +<75> magicka, and magicka regenerates <150>% faster.

Shrouded Robe: Destruction spells cost <15>% less to cast, and magicka regenerates <100>% faster.
author: szn
